Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1992
Subject: Progress of Tim Harikkala
Dear Sir,
Tim Harikkala has nothing more to prove at A Visalia Oaks!
He has an ERA of 0.74 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/8/1992
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Jack Clark
